dmca.title: COPYRIGHT INFRIGEMENT - AUP violation
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Juan Camilo Contreras Jaramillo [mailto:jcontreras@bc.com.co] 
Sent: Monday, December 11, 2006 9:06 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: COPYRIGHT INFRIGEMENT - AUP violation



 

Dear Sirs: 

 

Please find attached the notification letter of Mr. Carlos Duque (the author)
regarding a copyright claim against the domain name www.noticias24.com
<http://www.noticias24.com/>  for which you appear as the server. And evidence
related to this infringement.  

 

This claim is based upon your ACCEPTABLE USE POLICY and the copyright laws applying
to this matter (Digital Millennium Copyright Act). 

 

We expect you to remove or disable access to the infringing material upon receipt of
this notification. 

 

Please be informed that all communications on this matter should be reply to this
e-mail or contact Mr. Juan Camilo Contreras at the following: Telephone: (57 1)
7442200, ext 278, fax: (57 1) 7422200, and the address Carrera 7 No. 71 -21, Torre B
- Piso 4, in Bogot
